attributes.action: Help the people of Britain who contribute to society
attributes.additional_details:
Are you tired of working 40+ hours and being financialy worse off than somebody who chooses not to work, benefits should be allocated to encourage people to work and contribute to society........ Child care benefits should be given to families who work, why should somebody with ten kids who has never worked get £30k a year in benefits......when the workers get £20 a week child tax credit and pay over £400 in child care!
Put the GREAT back in Britain and help those who choose to help themselves.
